attributes.action: Bring Heathrow rail link costs in line with other London rail links.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fare for the Heathrow Express (Express train linking London Paddington to Heathrow terminals) and Heathrow Connect (Stopping service linking West London with Heathrow terminals) is criminally high.

Often quoted as the highest fares, per mile, of any railway worldwide.

This damages tourism, entices airport wokers to use their own transport, ie cars, and costs businesses even more to use Heathrow effectively.

Including Heathrow overground rail links within the TFL zoning areas, such as zone 6 (the same as current LU stations) will make this fair and transparent.

The current system just allows BAA to make more money from their monopoly over London's airlinks.
